search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Clockify (clockify.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Clockify is: [https://clockify.me/pricing](https://clockify.me/pricing) .

| Time Tracking |

Unlimited tracking

Affordable plans. Quick & easy setup. No hidden fees. Trusted by 4M+ users. Free and paid plans

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Clockify offers a free tier with unlimited tracking and additional paid tiers with enhanced features.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Includes additional features for small teams.
